name: Avenue of Stars

images.alt: The entrance plaza of the Avenue of Stars with a large map display
Aerial view of Victoria Harbour and the promenade from an elevated vantage point
Walkway and viewing platform along the Avenue of Stars, lined with tourists
Palm trees and crowds at dusk on the Avenue of Stars overlooking the harbour
Nighttime skyline of Victoria Harbour seen from the Avenue of Stars

description: The Avenue of Stars runs along the Victoria Harbour waterfront and offers one of the best vantage points for capturing Hong Kong's skyline and nightly light show. Whether you visit in daylight or after dark, you'll experience stunning views of the city across the water.

name: Victoria Peak

images.alt: View of Victoria Peak tram station and surrounding plaza
Panoramic vista of Hong Kong Island and Victoria Harbour from the Peak
The Peak tram winding up the hillside past lush greenery

description: Victoria Peak offers the most sweeping views over Hong Kong Island and Victoria Harbour. A ride on the historic Peak Tram transports you up steep slopes to a spectacular vantage point—ideal for photographers and first-time visitors alike.

name: Central Harbourfront

images.alt: Central's heritage façades glowing in dusk light
Central's buildings and road in the evening.
Visitors posing in front of the 'I LOVE 852' sign beside the Ferris wheel

description: Central Harbourfront features the iconic Hong Kong Observation Wheel and a bustling promenade of shops and eateries. It's a perfect spot to snap panoramic city views by day or enjoy the wheel's colorful lights after sunset.

name: Disney Land

images.alt: A boy stands in the front of Disyney special railway
Disney castle in the morning with many visitors
The interior decoration of one entertainment facility of Disney
Disney castle in the evening with colorful lights

description: A magical theme park featuring classic Disney characters, rides and nightly castle projections

name: Wong Tai Sin

images.alt: The temple mall of Wong Tai Sin and some stores
The inside attic corridor and pond of Wong Tai Sin
Attic corridor and pond of Wong Tai Sin with a focus on pond

description: Wong Tai Sin Temple is a renowned shrine in Kowloon's Wong Tai Sin district, celebrated for its vibrant architecture and “kau chim” fortune-telling.

name: Hong Kong Park

images.alt: Hong Kong Park entrance sign illuminated at night with surrounding plants
Night view of a tiled fountain and colonnade walkway inside Hong Kong Park
Curved glass railing and tiled plaza under a geometric canopy in Hong Kong Park
Small illuminated garden nook with wooden pergola and decorative lights in Hong Kong Park

description: Hong Kong Park is a green oasis in Central with gardens, fountains and pavilions. It's beautifully lit at night for a peaceful city escape.

name: Hong Kong Zoological and Botanical Gardens

images.alt: The entrance of Hong Kong Zoological and Botanical Gardens with a large fountain
Bronze statue of King George V standing on a stone plinth surrounded by tropical plants

description: Hong Kong Zoological and Botanical Gardens is a historic green sanctuary on Hong Kong Island (in Central), featuring themed animal enclosures, formal flower beds and shaded walkways amid mature trees.

name: Sweetgum Forest

images.alt: Reddish young shoots and wet leaves in front of misty green hills
Straight concrete path lined with trees showing early autumn foliage
Winding forest road snaking uphill between mixed green and orange trees
Dense undergrowth and tree canopy framing a view of verdant hillside

description: Maple Grove in Yuen Long is a scenic trail area where the young shoots turn red like maple leaves, set against misty hills and winding paths—an off-beat spot for a quiet forest walk.
